lcap-printPage/hidden.description: Whether to display the print button

lcap-printPage/isNotFullPage.description: Whether the printed PDF is paginated

lcap-printPage/canvasWidth.description: Set the width of the print file

lcap-printPage/canvasHeight.description: Set the height of the print file

lcap-printPage/download.description: Whether to automatically download printed files

lcap-printPage/fileType.description: Set the file type for printing
